title: Handle a Vessel Diversion
description: A vessel scheduled to arrive at the port is diverted to another port by its owners at the last minute.

tasks.description: Receive notification from the vessel agent that the vessel will no longer be calling at the port.
tasks.expected_outcome: The scheduler receives the cancellation notice.

tasks.description: Cancel the vessel's berth allocation in the scheduling system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The berth previously assigned to the vessel is now shown as available.

tasks.description: Cancel all associated pilot, tug, and mooring services to avoid cancellation fees.
tasks.expected_outcome: All booked services for the vessel call are successfully cancelled.
